Prophecy

Scenario: The Prophet of Inquisition's Divine Convoy has been spotted landing on the roof of a structure in a rainforest

Objective 1: Reach the Temple Exterior

  • Objective 1A: Sabotage Covenant Weevils
    • Reward: Ally reinforcements are available in O2
  • Objective 1B: Kill Jiralhanae Stalkers
    • Reward: More ally reinforcements in O2
  • Objective 1C: Kill a Sharqoi
    • Reward: Sharqoi do not spawn in O2

Twist: The Covenant have fully fortified the temple

Objective 2: Capture, interrogate, and kill the Prophet of Inquisition

  • Objective 2A: Sabotage the Divine Convoy
    • Reward: Weaker enemy reinforcements in Cartographer
  • Objective 2B: Kill the Sangheili Honor Guard
    • Reward: Fewer Sangheili Honor Guard spawns in Cartographer
  • Objective 2C: Capture a Huragok
    • Reward 2C: O2C automatically completed in Cartographer

Conclusion: The Prophet of Inquisition traveled to the temple to decipher holy Forerunner text divining the location of the Silent Cartographer
